name: Fun Goal 3D
summary:
Football Game is all about getting to the soccer goal and scoring goals! You’ve never played a football game like this before.
Run with the football, follow curved and winding paths on the soccer field, dribble pass countless enemy football players and crazy obstacles to get to the soccer goal, and score the perfect goal!
Tap and hold to play this fast-paced soccer game. Just make sure you don’t hit the other football players or any other crazy obstacle in your way! Can you get to the end? You’ll need lightning-fast reactions, perfect timing and all your football hero superpowers to get to the goal!
Experience soccer in a way you have never experienced before. You'll find it so simple you'll never want to play another football game. You’ll score one goal after another like a professional football player. You're the striker, and nobody will get in your way as you kick balls and score goals!
You’ll face hundreds of challenges across the levels with all kinds of different football players and obstacles. You will discover these as you master shooting goals and you become a soccer star. You will earn coins as you progress the levels and you’ll be able to buy all kinds of balls.
This football game will take you back on the soccer field to the game of your dreams.
